pr_title: Add platforms to the new project wizard

timeline.message: Add platforms to the new project wizard
Add settings when page two is displayed but not when Finish is clicked

timeline.bodyText: Is this a built in plugin for IntelliJ?
timeline.author: devoncarew

timeline.bodyText: Platform availability might depend on your Flutter SDK channel and 'flutter config' settings. ?
timeline.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: And, should we have a tooltip on the 'Platform' label (on in-line text in the UI) that clarifies that it's used to select which platforms flutter create will generate template code for? And that other platforms can be added after the initial project creation.
replies.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure how verbose we should be. I considered adding another line with some explanation, and think I'll do that now. However, I misunderstood the purpose of the config file. I'm going to have to rewrite some of this. Instead of enabling check boxes based on platforms enabled in the config file it seems those should be the ones checked by default. All should be enabled.
replies.author: stevemessick

timeline.bodyText: I don't know if that's actually intended or if the flutter tool would pay attention to that.
timeline.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: It doesn't. But if someone went to that much trouble we should initialize the checkboxes to respect the setting, I think.
replies.author: stevemessick
